text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_REVERSE
text.text: EV: Reverse snap/track direction (180° turn around)

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_LINES_MODE
text.text: EV: Change display mode of lines

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACK_1
text.text: EV: Increase amount of turnover tracks

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACK_2
text.text: EV: Decrease amount of turnover tracks

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKP_1
text.text: EV: Move tracks to the right

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKP_2
text.text: EV: Move tracks to the left

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKO_1
text.text: EV: Move offset line to the right

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKO_2
text.text: EV: Move offset line to the left

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKJ_1
text.text: EV: Move vehicle one track to the right (no turn)

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKJ_2
text.text: EV: Move vehicle one track to the left (no turn)

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_HL_DIST_1
text.text: EV: Increase headland distance to end of field

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_HL_DIST_2
text.text: EV: Decrease headland distance to end of field

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_FD
text.text: EV: Differential lock front axle on/off

text.name: input_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_RD
text.text: EV: Differential lock rear axle on/off

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_snapTT
text.text: Turn on/off global track assistent functionality

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_diffTT
text.text: Turn on/off global differential lock functionality

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_hydraulicTT
text.text: Turn on/off global improved hydraulic control functionality

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_parkingBrakeTT
text.text: Turn on/off global parking brake functionality

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_odoMeterTT
text.text: Turn on/off global mileage counter functionality

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdiffTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for differential lock

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for damage values

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDfuelTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for fuel values

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtrackTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the track assistant

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDrpmTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the RPM number

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtempTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the engine temperature

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDmiscTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for misc values (e.g. weight)

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDparkTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the parking brake

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDodoTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the mileage counter

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgAmountLeftTT
text.text: Display damage values in '% left' rather than '% damaged'

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_snapSettingsAngleTT
text.text: Determines in which degree steps the driving direction is engaged (1°-90°)

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_visibleTracksTT
text.text: How many tracks are shown in total (left + right of vehicle)

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_showLinesTT
text.text: Specifies which kind of lines are shown

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_hideLinesTT
text.text: Specifies whether to automatically hide auxiliary and track lines

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_hideLinesAfterTT
text.text: After how many seconds the auxiliary and track lines will be automatically hidden

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_headlandModeTT
text.text: What should happen if headland is reached

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_headlandDistanceTT
text.text: Turn around how many meters before end of field

text.name: ui_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_headlandSoundTriggerDistanceTT
text.text: Specifies how many meters before headland is reached an alarm sound is played

text.name: global_FS25_EnhancedVehicle_snapNoImplement
text.text: Did not find a device with a working width. Using a default track layout.
